title: Remote for Panasonic TV+BD+AVR
summary: MyAV Universal remote, controls Panasonic and much more. Free 7 Day Trial
description: Unofficial WI-Fi & IR remote control for Panasonic Televisions & Blu-ray Players.Your Panasonic Smart TV must be connect to your router AND YOUR ROUTER MUST HAVE uPnP ENABLED... if the app doesn't find your Panasonic Smart TV the please CONTACT US by email or read the instructions on our website. If you have a Samsung device with an IR blaster, this will be detected by MyAV and older IR equipment can be controlled too. (Can also turn on the Panasonic TV by IR)Compatible Samsung phones include the Galaxy S4, S4 Mini, Galaxy S5 & Galaxy Note III.Compatible Samsung tablets include the Note 10.1 Tab 3 8 and a few othersFor the UK ,Germany and and the Netherlands  channel shortcuts are available. These can be renumbered by dragging them to the pop-up keypad that appears when you long-click on a shortcut.Panasonic Smart Televisions2013:  VT60/VT65 (tested), ZT65/ZT60 (tested), ST60 (tested),GT60 (tested), WT60/WT65 (tested), DT60/DT65 (tested), FT60 (untested), ET60 (untested), E6 (tested), X6 (untested)2012:  VT50 (documented support), ST50 (documented support), GT50 (tested), WT50 (documented support), DT50 (documented support), ET50 (documented support), ET5 (tested), E5 (documented support), X5 (documented support)2011: VT30 (untested), ST30 (untested),GT30 (untested), DT30 (untested), GT31 (untested), PST34 (untested), ST30 (untested)Panasonic Blu-Ray Players2012: DMP-BDT500 (untested), DMP-BDT320 (untested), DMP-BDT220 (untested), DMP-BDT120 (tested)2011: DMP-BDT310 (untested), DMP-BDT210 (untested), DMP-BDT110 (untested)This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP controllable devices.
descriptionHTML:
Unofficial WI-Fi & IR remote control for Panasonic Televisions & Blu-ray Players.
Your Panasonic Smart TV must be connect to your router AND YOUR ROUTER MUST HAVE uPnP ENABLED... if the app doesn't find your Panasonic Smart TV the please CONTACT US by email or read the instructions on our website.
If you have a Samsung device with an IR blaster, this will be detected by MyAV and older IR equipment can be controlled too. (Can also turn on the Panasonic TV by IR)
Compatible Samsung phones include the Galaxy S4, S4 Mini, Galaxy S5 & Galaxy Note III.
Compatible Samsung tablets include the Note 10.1 Tab 3 8 and a few others
For the UK ,Germany and and the Netherlands channel shortcuts are available. These can be renumbered by dragging them to the pop-up keypad that appears when you long-click on a shortcut.

Panasonic Smart Televisions
2013: VT60/VT65 (tested), ZT65/ZT60 (tested), ST60 (tested),GT60 (tested), WT60/WT65 (tested), DT60/DT65 (tested), FT60 (untested), ET60 (untested), E6 (tested), X6 (untested)
2012: VT50 (documented support), ST50 (documented support), GT50 (tested), WT50 (documented support), DT50 (documented support), ET50 (documented support), ET5 (tested), E5 (documented support), X5 (documented support)
2011: VT30 (untested), ST30 (untested),GT30 (untested), DT30 (untested), GT31 (untested), PST34 (untested), ST30 (untested)

Panasonic Blu-Ray Players
2012: DMP-BDT500 (untested), DMP-BDT320 (untested), DMP-BDT220 (untested), DMP-BDT120 (tested)
2011: DMP-BDT310 (untested), DMP-BDT210 (untested), DMP-BDT110 (untested)




This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP controllable devices.
comments: It's alright. However, for $9 I can buy the actual remote for my Blu Ray Player. What's the point of paying twice to use an IR blaster in my phone? It works as well as the free apps.
I lost my remote and this app is helping me
Says there is a trail forces you to pay 8.99 to use
Apparently my blu ray/av can't be made by Panasonic...
Panasonic/TWC This app actually works with IR.   So many assume we have WiFi control.
recentChanges: Support for Sky Pro & Sky HD (Cable) Germany
